title: Respite as easterly winds clear heavy pollution from the skies (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) The picture show the Shanghai skyline yesterday. The skies were heavily polluted early in the morning but cleared later in the day. There will be some relief today from the heavy smog that has
